Package de.ikor.sip.foundation.core.declarative.connector

Class GenericOutboundConnectorBase

java.lang.Object
de.ikor.sip.foundation.core.declarative.connector.ConnectorBase
de.ikor.sip.foundation.core.declarative.connector.GenericOutboundConnectorBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConnectorDefinition, OutboundConnectorDefinition, Orchestratable<ConnectorOrchestrationInfo>, IntegrationScenarioConsumerDefinition, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware
Direct Known Subclasses:
SoapOperationOutboundConnectorBase
public abstract class GenericOutboundConnectorBase extends ConnectorBase implements OutboundConnectorDefinition
Base class for defining generic outbound connectors.

Adapter developers should extend this class and annotate it with @OutboundConnector to specify the connector. The configuration of the outbound endpoint is done by overriding defineOutgoingEndpoint().

See Also:
  • Infos on attaching transformation between domain models of connector and integration scenario
  • OutboundConnector
